p: T. satureioides EOs from different plant parts were studied against a number of human, virus, and plant parasites. Indeed, Pavela [ 84] assessed the toxicity of T. satureioides EOs against the larvae of Culex quinquefasciatus Say (Diptera: Culicidae) and showed its effective larvicidal property with respective lethal concentrations (IC 50 and IC 90) of 44 μg/ml and 81.5 μg/ml.
